summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all requirements from the BuildRequest. The backend implements the complete data model and CRUD operations as specified. The frontend provides all three required pages (home, detail, create) with appropriate navigation and data display. The design applies a warm editorial color palette using OKLCH colors, serif typography for headings, and thoughtful spacing throughout. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, AuthClient)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'User authentication or role-based access control' as a non-goal, yet the implementation includes full Internet Identity authentication infrastructure in hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts and integrates it into the actor initialization flow

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode support with theme switching capability
hallucinated_features.reason: Dark mode theming was not requested in any requirement. The implementation includes comprehensive dark mode color definitions and theme switching infrastructure

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation header with logo (BookOpen icon) and branding ('The Journal')
hallucinated_features.reason: While a form and pages were requested, no requirement specified header navigation, logo, or specific branding beyond the blog functionality

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with copyright notice and external attribution link to caffeine.ai
hallucinated_features.reason: No footer or attribution requirements were specified in the BuildRequest
